scripts.postgres_up: cd dev && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up -d
scripts.dev: npm install && export NODE_ENV=development || set NODE_ENV=development&& concurrently "cd frontend && npm install && npm start" "cd backend && npm install && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy: export NODE_ENV=production || set NODE_ENV=production&& concurrently "cd frontend && npm install && npm run build" "cd backend && npm install && npm run deploy"
